attributes.additional_details: It is an essential service and needs to be reopened urgently.
attributes.background: Reopen essential passport services such as HPMO, fast track and face-to-face service.

rejection.details:
Although physical passport offices remain closed due to Covid-19 making face-to-face visits impossible, provisions exist where there is an urgent requirement: https://www.gov.uk/get-a-passport-urgently

You can read Her Majesty's Passport Office latest update on passport applications here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/her-majestys-passport-office-update-on-passport-applications
